National Sentence Text: Electrical installations shall conform to the appropriate provincial or territorial regulations or municipal bylaws, or in the absence of such regulations, to CSA C22.1-12 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I except that alternatives to these requirements are permitted as described in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1) in areas other than those described in Article 5.1.2.1.
P/T Sentence Text: Electrical installations shall conform to the British Columbia Electrical Safety Regulation
Label: Variation
